text: Saara Kuugongelwa-Amadhila (born 12 October 1967) is a Namibian politician. She has been the fifth Prime Minister of Namibia since 21 March 2015. She is a member of the South West Africa People's Organization (SWAPO). She has been a member of the National Assembly of Namibia since 1995 and was Minister of Finance from 2003 to 2015.Graham Hopwood:Who's Who, Kuugongelwa-Amadhila, Saara - Swapo Namibian Institute for Democracy She is the first woman to serve as Prime Minister of Namibia. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Namibia Category:Current national leaders
title: Saara Kuugongelwa
